content: July 21 Pet food maker Blue Buffalo Pet Products Inc priced its initial public offering of common stock at $20 per share  valuing the company at about $3.92 billion.
name: Blue Buffalo Pet Products Inc
title: Pet food maker Blue Buffalo prices IPO at $20

content: July 22 Shares of Blue Buffalo Pet Products Inc  rose as much as 37 percent in their debut  valuing the maker of Blue Wilderness and other dog and cat foods at $5.38 billion and highlighting growing demand for "healthier" meals for pets.
name: Blue Buffalo Pet Products Inc
title: UPDATE 1-Investors lap up shares of pet-food maker Blue Buffalo in debut

content: July 22 Shares of Blue Buffalo Pet Products Inc  rose as much as 36 percent in their debut  valuing the owner of pet-food brands such as Blue Basics and Blue Wilderness at $5.34 billion.
name: Blue Buffalo Pet Products Inc
title: Shares of pet-food maker Blue Buffalo soar in debut
